resources.string: This app is not the official Bakaláři app. It is not a product of BAKALÁŘI software s.r.o company. The username and password you enter will be stored in your device and in encrypted form sent to the URL you enter into the School Bakaláři Address field.
The address does not belong to any Bakaláři server.
Unknown error or no internet connection.
Unable to connect to Bakaláři. Data may not be up-to-date.
The address does not belong to any Bakaláři server or there is no internet connection.
The permission is needed in order to download homework attachments.
In order to open attachments of your homework, Bakalarium needs to access your phones memory. To be able to do that, you need to grant the permission.
In order to open attachments of your homework, Bakalarium needs to access your phones memory. To be able to do that, you need to grant the permission in system settings.
